content:
Hello Everyone,
I've been looking around the web for fhir profiles that would represent data regarding sleep duration and step count (data from smartwatch), but couldn't find anything official. Has anyone used any profile for such data? Would be super greateful for some guidance.
BR,
Lukas
These would be profiles on Observation. I'm not aware of any 'standard' profiles on this information as yet.

Would this be in the purview of the Devices on FHIR folks (which also has relationships with IHE and Continua and others in this 'problem space' of personal use devices): https://www.iheusa.org/devices-fhir
